parameters: \n<\N[9]>I think you'd better push some cereal onto my spoon,
otherwise it might scoop you up instead!
\n<\N[9]>Then again, perhaps getting scooped up on my spoon
is the whole reason you're here, isn't it \N[1]?
\n<\N[1]>(Should've known trying to surprise her would turn out
like this...\.\. Better do as she says.)
\n<\N[9]>We both know that annoying little tinies like you
belong in my bowl, not on the desk.
\n<\N[9]>Anyway, everything in my bowl is just my food, so I
can't be held responsible if you end up getting eaten.
\n<\N[9]>I suggest you push some cereal on my spoon,
otherwise it might just come after you instead.

\n<\N[9]>What's it like, \N[1]? I can only imagine how

\n<\N[9]>Swimming right onto my spoon yourself, \N[1]?\.\. If

\n<\N[9]>The itty bitty morsel that "just wanted to

\n<\N[9]>Why can't you just be honest with yourself?\.\.

\n<\N[9]>I warned you, so hold on tight to that cereal,

GabText Is the swimming pool nice, \N[1]?
GabText Having some trouble down there \N[1]?
GabText C'mon, it's just itty bitty pieces of cereal. Is it really that hard to move?
GabText Ahh Hiroshi, you somehow look delicious soaked in sweet milk!
GabText Jeez... Hurry it up! My cereal is getting soggy waiting for you slowpoke!
\n<\N[9]>Alright...\.\. Seriously I'm too hungry to wait for
you any longer.\.\. I gave you a chance.\.\. I can't be held
responsible if you end up on my spoon!
